blog.title: Protocol.Land is now open to all
blog.description: Protocol.Land announces its public launch, extending the benefits of decentralized code collaboration to everyone. Checkout what's in store and how to get started.

blog.title: Protocol Land integrates Othent for streamlined onboarding
blog.description: Protocol.Land integrates Othent for streamlined onboarding and secure way to access Protocol Land with social logins. Checkout what's in store and how to get started.

blog.title: Backing up GitHub repositories to Protocol.Land
blog.description: Effortlessly backup GitHub repositories on Protocol.Land, a decentralized code collaboration platform built atop Arweave ensuring permanent, verifiable backups.

blog.title: Dragon Deploy: Redefining Static Page Deployment with Protocol.Land
blog.description: Explore Dragon Deploy, the latest Protocol.Land integration that revolutionizes static page deployment on Arweave, providing a seamless experience for developers writing code on the permaweb. Join Protocol.Land today.

blog.title: Rewarding Open Source Contributions with Protocol.land
blog.description: Explore the impact of open source and how Protocol.Land’s built-in bounty feature addresses the challenges of rewarding contributors and project sustainability.

blog.title: Tailoring Your Profile: Personalize Every Detail
blog.description: See how you can customize and tailor your profile details on Protocol.Land.

blog.title: BetterIDEa's Codebase finds its permanent home on Protocol.Land
blog.description: Learn how BetterIDEa has ensured a permanent, complete, verifiable history of their IDE using Protocol.Land.

blog.title: LiteSeed secures access to its services
blog.description: Explore what LiteSeed has to offer and how they are preserving access to their services with Protocol.Land.

blog.title: Guide to tokenization of open source code on Protocol.Land
blog.description: Learn how to tokenize your open source code on Protocol.Land.

blog.title: All Information on Protocol Pioneers
blog.description: Whether you’re a developer or technology steward, we have challenges for you to complete and prizes for you to win. Click to learn more.

blog.title: 4-Day AO Smart Contract Challenge
blog.description: Immerse yourself in this four-day challenge that will guide you through building smart contracts on AO, using the Lua programming language.
